convnettrainer Module¶

ConvnetTrainer class makes use of hooks. Hooks are a collection of methods which provide quick access to exact entry in loop. In this way, we can override these methods with custom functionality in either training, evaluation or test loops.

Non-lifecycle hooks¶

Default methods¶

  • init_attr()

  • get_trainloader()

  • get_testloader()

  • build_model() | build_parallel_model()

Methods to initalize class attributes¶

  • define_data_attr()

  • define_model_attr()

  • define_train_attr()

  • define_test_attr()

  • define_log_attr()

  • define_compute_attr()

  • define_misc_attr()

Native methods¶

  • loss_backward()

  • optimizer_step()

  • load_model() | load_parallel_model()

  • save_model() | save_parallel_model()

Lifecycle hooks¶

Training loop¶

Evaluation Loop¶

Test loop¶
